title: Carpeting, High speed internet, Refrigerator
posting_body: ['Viridian is your ideal Las Vegas, Nevada destination for apartment home comfort in an unbeatable location.', 'Our studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes have something for everyone.', 'Our apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, open layouts, balcony or patio options, wood-style flooring, and views of the Las Vegas Strip.', "You'll find that your lifestyle is comfortable in the heart of it all at Viridian.", 'Call or chat with us to schedule your tour today.', '-Window Coverings', '-Refrigerator', '-Refreshed Fitness Center', '-Hard Surface', 'Flooring With 4.5 Inch Base Boards', '-New Fully Renovated Interiors!', '-Range', '-Near Public Transit', '-Updated Lavish Landscaping', '-Covered Parking', '-Renovated and Expanded Clubhouse With a Refreshed Fitness Center', '-Satellite', '-Dishwasher', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
